TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Cursors extends System.Object
public ref class Cursors abstract sealed

span.span: Defines a set of default cursors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個靜態類別會定義一組常見的預設資料指標的應用程式。This static class defines a set of default cursors common to applications. 定義資料指標的各種靜態屬性不是直接用於[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，但使用的是間接透過兩個可能的機制：The various static properties defining cursors are not directly usable in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], but are indirectly used through two possible mechanisms: - 類別會執行任何的型別轉換[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]屬性，會採用型別，讓值列舉型別指定為屬性值會評估為其中一個靜態屬性。The class performs type conversion on any [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] attribute that takes type , such that a value of the enumeration specified as the attribute value will evaluate to one of the static properties. - 靜態屬性值可透過[X:static 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension.md)。A static property value can be used through the [x:Static Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property AppStarting As Cursor
public: static property System::Windows::Input::Cursor ^ AppStarting { System::Windows::Input::Cursor ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得應用程式啟動時出現的 。

span.span: Gets the that appears when an application is starting.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常表示，系統將會載入的詳細資訊，但使用者介面可以處理輸入。The typically indicates that the system is loading information, but the user interface can handle input. ## XAML 文字使用方式XAML Text Usage 請參閱備註。See Remark on .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Arrow As Cursor
public: static property System::Windows::Input::Cursor ^ Arrow { System::Windows::Input::Cursor ^ get(); };

remarks.format: ## Remarks 箭號通常是預設資料指標。The arrow is typically the default cursor. ## XAML 文字使用方式XAML Text Usage 請參閱備註。See Remark on .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property ArrowCD As Cursor
public: static property System::Windows::Input::Cursor ^ ArrowCD { System::Windows::Input::Cursor ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得有光碟 的箭號。

span.span: Gets the arrow with a compact disk .

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML 文字使用方式XAML Text Usage 請參閱備註。See Remark on .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Cross As Cursor
public: static property System::Windows::Input::Cursor ^ Cross { System::Windows::Input::Cursor ^ get(); };

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個資料指標通常會出現個繪圖作業執行所在的區域。This cursor typically appears over regions in which a drawing operation can be performed. ## XAML 文字使用方式XAML Text Usage 請參閱備註。See Remark on .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Hand As Cursor
public: static property System::Windows::Input::Cursor ^ Hand { System::Windows::Input::Cursor ^ get(); };

remarks.format: ## Remarks 手形通常表示指標是透過連結。The hand typically indicates the pointer is over a link. ## XAML 文字使用方式XAML Text Usage 請參閱備註。See Remark on .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Help As Cursor
public: static property System::Windows::Input::Cursor ^ Help { System::Windows::Input::Cursor ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得由箭號和問號組成的說明 。

span.span: Gets a help which is a combination of an arrow and a question mark.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，均提供即時線上說明時，會顯示這個資料指標。Typically, this cursor is displayed when context-sensitive help is available. ## XAML 文字使用方式XAML Text Usage 請參閱備註。See Remark on .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property IBeam As Cursor
public: static property System::Windows::Input::Cursor ^ IBeam { System::Windows::Input::Cursor ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 I 型 ，這個游標用來顯示當按一下滑鼠時文字游標出現的位置。

span.span: Gets an I-beam , which is used to show where the text cursor appears when the mouse is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML 文字使用方式XAML Text Usage 請參閱備註。See Remark on .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 游標提供方法來隱藏資料指標。The cursor provides a means of hiding the cursor. ## XAML 文字使用方式XAML Text Usage 請參閱備註。See Remark on .

public: static property System::Windows::Input::Cursor ^ Wait { System::Windows::Input::Cursor ^ get(); };

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這通常表示應用程式正忙於執行運算。This typically indicates that the application is busy performing an operation. ## XAML 文字使用方式XAML Text Usage 請參閱備註。See Remark on .
